direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process configuration inputs but perform different operations.
Both methods handle object creation with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods modify the state of the Shell object by setting up the terminal and environment.

enhanced_by.reason: The parse method is used to set up the configuration required by the create method.
The run method must be invoked after the create method to execute the shell operations.
The instantiate method can be used to verify the creation of objects within the Shell environment.
